Hey, I'm Julian.

A software engineer with 5 years of experience building web applications. I've worked closely with project managers, designers, and fellow software developers to build the next generation of web-based applications leveraging both client-side and server-side rendered architectures. I enjoy writing clean code, adhering to best practices, and working in a collaborative environment. Feel free to reach out and discuss software engineering opportunities.
